words.source: H4100; KJV/ESV/NASB: 'How' (interrogative adverb introducing the exclamation of beauty)
H2895; KJV: 'goodly'; ESV: 'fair'; NASB: 'beautiful' (adjective used predicatively)
H168; KJV: 'thy tents'; ESV/NASB: 'your tents' (plural construct + 2ms suffix)
H3290; KJV/ESV/NASB: 'O Jacob' / 'Jacob' (proper name in vocative)
H4908; KJV: 'thy tabernacles'; ESV: 'your dwellings'; NASB: 'your dwellings' (plural construct + 2ms suffix)
H3478; KJV/ESV/NASB: 'O Israel' / 'Israel' (proper name in vocative)
